name: Destroyers of Chaos
description:
How long can you defend your lands from the hordes of chaos? Dive into this 2D Hack & slash, with pixel art style to defeat relentless hordes of enemies.

Hi! 

I am Lucas Garcia an indie developer, this is my first project in which I invested more than 100 hours. 

I put all the enthusiasm and motivation I could into creating this game. 

I hope you enjoy it and let me know what you would like to see added in future updates and what bugs need to be fixed.

Thank you very much for your interest in my work!
